channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats name their price on ending government shutdown
item.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) said Friday that Democrats would vote to end the shutdown in exchange for a one-year extension of expiri...

item.title: Trump administration sued over its "loyalist" hiring policy
item.description: A coalition of unions representing federal workers filed a lawsuit against the White House Thursday over the inclusion of what they say is a partisan ...

item.title: Trump says GOP would never lose an election again if filibuster is eliminated
item.description: President Trump rattled off a list of GOP policies that would benefit from eliminating the filibuster on Friday, including the assertion that Republic...

item.title: Trump touts Walmart's cheaper Thanksgiving meal, downplays missing products
item.description: President Trump has been pointing to Walmart's reduced Thanksgiving meal as proof that his economic agenda is driving prices down across the board. Wh...

item.title: Trump admin appeals order to pay SNAP benefits in full
item.description: The Trump administration asked an appeals court to block a judge's ruling that the federal government must pay November SNAP benefits in full by the e...

item.title: Labor Department social media campaign depicts a White male workforce
item.description: The campaign has drawn scrutiny, with critics saying it is not realistically portraying the country’s diversity and is sending messages that feel excl...

item.title: How a backlash to Trump fueled Democratic gains with Latino voters
item.description: The president’s deportation policies, along with high prices and changes in who turned out to vote propelled a shift in this year’s election.

item.title: Elise Stefanik announces run for New York governor with focus on affordability
item.description: Elected to the House as a moderate, Elise Stefanik evolved into a fierce Trump defender, and her announcement could set up a faceoff with New York Gov...

item.title: Flight cancellations hit major airports on first day of FAA reductions
item.description: Airlines have canceled more than 1,000 flights to comply with a shutdown-related FAA directive to reduce traffic at 40 airports, including Atlanta, Ch...

item.title: Trump flirts with exempting Hungary’s Orban from Russia oil sanctions
item.description: Hungary has remained a defiant outlier as much of Europe has stopped purchasing Russian oil since its 2022 full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
